(OOC: *sigh*)
(OOC2: C'mon Yan, give Wolfgang some credit, (and me) he wouldnt try to 
"take over" with all that defence. He wouldnt even try to "take over" 
without defence. Please play IN charector.)

:: Wolfgang ::

The last thing I remember is being held at the basement of the alliance 
base.

:: Remembers that FZ was the one who trapped him there. ::

You basterd!  Oh, yeah, and im feeling fine, thank you for asking.

:: Goes over and faces FZ eye-to-eye. ::

How could you?  You arrogant basterd.
